titleStmt.title: The design of part of the book of Ecclesiastes, or, The unreasonableness of mens restless contentions for the present enjoyments represented in an English poem.
titleStmt.author: Wollaston, William, 1660-1724.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Wollaston by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"A paraphrase on part of the book of Ecclesiastes ...": p. 127-141.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
